This indicates that the user has likely navigated back to the main screen after renaming the file. The screenshot doesn't provide direct confirmation that the file was successfully renamed to 'MyDocument.txt' within the Downloads folder. We can't see the contents of the Downloads folder to verify the change.

Therefore, based solely on the final screenshot, we cannot definitively confirm that the goal was achieved.
